pages.title: Shifting Upgrade Template
pages.text: This is used to upgrade a diamond pickaxe to the "Shifting" level.$(br2) This is made from Spouting "Liquid Purple Dragon Essence" onto a "Netherite Upgrade Template".
This pickaxe is required to mine the "Jagged Stone Ore".
Can only be mined with a "Shifting Pickaxe" or higher.
Made from compacting "Jagged Stone Dust", "Clay Balls", and "Lava".

pages.title: Shifting Essence
pages.text: Obtained from killing the "Tropospherical Shard of the Dragon".

pages.title: Liquid Purple Essence
pages.text: Obtained from draining a "Shifting Dragon Essence" item.
Obtained from a Sequenced Assembly starting with "Charged Jagged Crystal Brick", and adding to it "Jagged Crystal", and "Liquid Purple Dragon Essence".

pages.title: End Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Amplified End Portal
